sentences.sContent: Half say they get no overtime.
sentences.sCn: 有一半人说他们没有加班。

sentences.sContent: How about overtime meals, can we expense them?
sentences.sContent_eng: How about overtime meals, can we expense them?
sentences.sCn: 加班就餐怎么办?我们能报销吗?。

sentences.sContent: On one particular Friday, I left the office after a week full of overtime and complete immersion in the work.
sentences.sContent_eng: On one particular Friday, I left the office after a week full of overtime and complete immersion in the work.
sentences.sCn: 在一个普通的星期五，在一个星期的加班和在工作中完全的沉浸之后我离开办公室。

phrases.pCn: 加班加点工作，超时工作
